name: Zeolite A in which silver, zinc and ammonium ions have been exchanged for sodium ions. The silver content of the modified zeolite shall not exceed 2.5 percent by weight.
FoodContactSubstance: Zeolite A in which silver, zinc and ammonium ions have been exchanged for sodium ions. The silver content of the modified zeolite shall not exceed 2.5 percent by weight.
